document_data.name: Chen Ching Ch'ien
document_data.mainbody: '''Chen Ching Ch'ien''' was a [[river spirit folk]] [[kensai]] in [[Cham Fau]] in [[Shou Lung]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Aside from her kensai practices with fellow student [[Ju Huo Wang]] at the [[Wang Ho School]], Cheng Ching every morning swam and meditated at the [[Hungste River]], a place that she had ties to as a spirit.
document_data.Personality: Chen Ching was very quiet and focused, a trait that helped her channeling her [[ki]].
document_data.Relationship: It was rumored that Ju Huo loved Chen Ching Ch'ien, but she was turned off by his temper.
